name.th: บันทึกไปยัง Google ไดรฟ์
name.zh_CN: 保存到 Google 云端硬盘
name.zh_TW: 儲存至 Google 雲端硬碟

short.ar: حفظ محتوى الويب أو ما تم التقاطه على الشاشة مباشرةً إلى Google Drive.
short.am: የድር ይዘት አስቀምጥ ወይም በቀጥታ ወደ Google Drive ማያ ገፅ ቅረጽ።
short.bg: Запазвайте уеб съдържание или екранни снимки директно в/ъв Google Диск.
short.bn: Google Drive এ সরাসরি ওয়েব সামগ্রী বা স্ক্রিন ক্যাপচার সংরক্ষণ করে৷
short.ca: Desa el contingut web i les captures de pantalla directament a Google Drive.
short.cs: Uložte webový obsah nebo snímek obrazovky přímo do aplikace Disk Google.
short.da: Gem webindhold eller skærm direkte i Google Drev.
short.de: Webinhalte oder Screenshots direkt in Google Drive speichern.
short.el: Αποθήκευση περιεχομένου ιστού ή λήψης οθόνης απευθείας στο Google Drive.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Save web content or screen capture directly to Google Drive.
short.es: Guarda el contenido web o la captura de pantalla directamente en Google Drive .
short.es_419: Esta extensión guarda el contenido web o las capturas de pantalla directamente en Google Drive.
short.et: Salvestage veebisisu või ekraanipilt otse rakendusse Google Drive.
short.fa: ذخیره محتوای وب یا ضبط صفحه نمایش به‌طور مستقیم درGoogle Drive .
short.fi: Tallenna verkon sisältö tai näytön kuvakaappaus suoraan sovellukseen Google Drive.
short.fil: I-save ang nilalaman ng web o i-screen capture nang direkta sa Google Drive.
short.fr: Enregistrez du contenu Web ou des captures d'écran directement sur Google Drive.
short.gu: વેબ સામગ્રી અથવા સ્ક્રીન કેપ્ચરને સીધા Google Drive પર સાચવો.
short.he: שמירת תוכן מהאינטרנט או צילום מסך ישירות ב-Google Drive.
short.hi: वेब सामग्री या स्क्रीन कैप्चर को सीधे Google Drive पर सेव करें.
short.hr: Spremanje web-sadržaja ili snimke zaslona izravno u aplikaciju Google disk.
short.hu: Mentse a webes tartalmakat és a képernyőmentéseket közvetlenül a(z) Google Drive alkalmazásba!
short.id: Simpan konten web atau jepretan layar secara langsung ke Google Drive.
short.it: Salva i contenuti web o lo screenshot direttamente su Google Drive.
short.ja: ウェブ コンテンツやスクリーン キャプチャを Google ドライブ に直接保存します。
short.kn: ವೆಬ್ ಕಂಟೆಂಟ್‍ ಅಥವಾ ಸ್ಕ್ರೀನ್ ಕ್ಯಾಪ್ಚರ್ ಅನ್ನು ನೇರವಾಗಿ Google Drive ನಲ್ಲಿ ಉಳಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 웹 콘텐츠 또는 화면 캡처를 Google Drive에 직접 저장합니다.
short.lt: Įrašyti žiniatinklio turinį arba ekrano vaizdą tiesiai į „„Google“ diskas“.
short.lv: Saglabājiet tīmekļa saturu vai ekrānuzņēmumu tieši lietotnē Google disks.
short.ml: Google Drive എന്നതിലേക്ക് വെബ് ഉള്ളടക്കമോ സ്‌ക്രീൻ ക്യാപ്‌ചറോ നേരിട്ട് സംരക്ഷിക്കുക.
short.mr: वेब आशय किंवा स्‍क्रीन कॅप्‍चर थेट Google Drive वर सेव्ह करा.
short.ms: Simpan kandungan web atau imej tangkapan skrin terus ke Google Drive.
short.nl: Webinhoud of screenshots rechtstreeks opslaan in Google Drive.
short.no: Lagre nettinnhold eller skjermdumper direkte i Google Disk.
short.pl: Zapisz treść strony lub zrzut ekranu bezpośrednio w Dysk Google.
short.pt_BR: Salvar conteúdo da Web ou captura de tela diretamente em Google Drive.
short.pt_PT: Guardar conteúdos da Web ou captura de ecrã diretamente para Google Drive.
short.ro: Salvează conținutul web sau captura de ecran direct în Google Drive.
short.ru: Сохраняйте содержимое веб-страниц и скриншоты в приложении "Google Диск".
short.sk: Ukladajte webový obsah alebo snímajte obrazovky priamo v aplikácii Disk Google.
short.sl: Shranjevanje spletne vsebine ali zajem zaslonske slike neposredno v Google Drive.
short.sr: Сачувајте веб-садржај или снимак екрана директно у Google диск.
short.sv: Spara webbinnehåll eller skärmbild direkt i Google Drive.
short.sw: Hifadhi maudhui ya mtandao au picha za skrini moja kwa moja kwenye Hifadhi ya Google.
short.ta: இணைய உள்ளடக்கம் அல்லது திரைப் பிடிப்பை நேரடியாக Google Drive இல் சேமிக்கலாம்.
short.te: వెబ్ కంటెంట్ లేదా స్క్రీన్ క్యాప్చర్‌ను నేరుగా Google Driveకు సేవ్ చేయండి.
short.th: บันทึกเนื้อหาเว็บหรือภาพหน้าจอลงใน Google ไดรฟ์ โดยตรง
short.tr: Web içeriği veya ekran görüntüsünü doğrudan Google Drive uygulamasına kaydedin.
short.uk: Збереження веб-вмісту або знімка екрана безпосередньо в програмі Google Диск.
short.vi: Lưu nội dung trang web hoặc ảnh chụp màn hình trực tiếp vào Google Drive.
short.zh_CN: 将网络内容或屏幕截图直接保存到Google 云端硬盘。
short.zh_TW: 將網頁內容或螢幕截圖直接儲存到 Google 雲端硬碟。

long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,es_419,:
The Save to Google Drive Chrome extension helps you save web content or browser screenshots to your Google Drive.
* Adds a browser action to save the current page.
* Adds a right-click context menu to save hyperlinks and media.
* Configurable through an options page.


This extension allow you to save web content directly to Google Drive through a browser action or context menu. You can save documents, images, and HTML5 audio and video all by right clicking and selecting 'Save to Google Drive'. You can save the currently viewed page using the 'Save to Google Drive' browser action. The directory location and format of saved HTML pages can be controlled with the extension's options page (Choice of Entire image (default), Visible image, Raw HTML, MHTML, or Google Doc). You can automatically convert Microsoft Office files or comma separated files to Google Docs format.

After your content is saved, the progress dialog allows you to open the file, rename, or view the file in the Google Drive document list. From the document list, you can organize and share your new document.

To save a file:// URLs, or to enable in incognito mode, go to chrome://extensions/ and enable the associated checkbox.

Due to security restrictions, this extension cannot capture chrome:// pages or Chrome Web Store pages.

New in Version 2.1:
Authorization now requires you to be signed into Chrome. In order to save to a different Google Drive account, you must change Chrome profiles.

New in Version 2.0.1:
Bug fix for Authentication page redirecting to about:blank after clicking Accept.

New in Version 2:
* Uses OAuth2 authentication flow, so you will need to re-authenticate on first use
* Ability to choose destination folder (configured in Options page)
* Support for high devicePixelRatio (Chrome Pixel & Retina displays)
* Clicking saved folder name displays the newly uploaded file in the destination directory
* Options are stored in shared storage, so are synchronized across browsers if Chrome Sync is enabled.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
long.am,et,ms,sw:
The Save to Google Drive Chrome extension helps you save web content or browser screenshots to your Google Drive.
* Adds a browser action to save the current page.
* Adds a right-click context menu to save hyperlinks and media.

This extension allow you to save web content directly to Google Drive through a browser action or context menu. You can save links to documents, images, and HTML5 audio and video all by right clicking and selecting 'Save to Google Drive'. You can save the currently viewed page using the 'Save to Google Drive' browser action. The format of saved HTML pages can be controlled with the extension's options page (Choice of Entire image (default), Visible image, Raw HTML, MHTML, or Google Doc). You can automatically convert Microsoft Office files or comma separated files to Google docs format.

After your content is saved, the progress dialog allows you to open the file, rename, or view the file in the Google Drive document list. From the document list, you can organize and share your new document.

To save a file:// URLs, or to enable in incognito mode, go to chrome://extensions/ and enable the associated checkbox.

Due to security restrictions, this extension cannot capture chrome:// pages or Chrome Web Store pages.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
long.en,en_AU,en_US:
The Save to Google Drive Chrome extension helps you save web content or browser screenshots to your Google Drive.
* Adds a browser action to save the current page.
* Adds a right-click context menu to save hyperlinks and media.
* Configurable through an options page.
* Save a PDF of the current page via the Chrome Print menu


This extension allows you to save web content directly to Google Drive through a browser action or context menu. You can save documents, images, and HTML5 audio and video all by right clicking and selecting 'Save to Google Drive'. You can save the currently viewed page using the 'Save to Google Drive' browser action or as a PDF from the Chrome Print menu.. The directory location and format of saved HTML pages can be controlled with the extension's options page (Choice of Entire image (default), Visible image, Raw HTML, MHTML, or Google Doc). You can automatically convert Microsoft Office files or comma separated files to Google Docs format.

After your content is saved, the progress dialog allows you to open the file, rename, or view the file in the Google Drive document list. From the document list, you can organize and share your new document.

To save a file:// URLs, or to enable in incognito mode, go to chrome://extensions/ and enable the associated checkbox.

Due to security restrictions, this extension cannot capture chrome:// pages or Chrome Web Store pages.

New in Version 2.3.8:
* Fixes authorization bug.

New in Version 2.3.2:
* Fixes a bug where certain PDF files would save without an extension name.

New in Version 2.3.1:
* Bug fixes.
* Allows for the printing of the current page from Google Chrome to Google Drive, as a PDF. Note: Currently Google Chrome provides this feature natively, but this native feature will soon be replaced fully by this Chrome Extension's similar feature.

New in Version 2.1.1:
Bug fixes.

New in Version 2.1:
Authorization now requires you to be signed into Chrome. In order to save to a different Google Drive account, you must change Chrome profiles.

New in Version 2.0.1:
Bug fix for Authentication page redirecting to about:blank after clicking Accept.

New in Version 2:
* Uses OAuth2 authentication flow, so you will need to re-authenticate on first use
* Ability to choose destination folder (configured in Options page)
* Support for high devicePixelRatio (Chrome Pixel & Retina displays)
* Clicking saved folder name displays the newly uploaded file in the destination directory
* Options are stored in shared storage, so are synchronized across browsers if Chrome Sync is enabled.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
long.he:
Internal Dogfood Version.
Questions and feedback to goto/drive-extension-feedback.

The Google Drive Chrome extension helps you save web content to your Google Drive.
* Adds a browser action to save the current page.
* Adds a right-click context menu to save hyperlinks, documents and media.

This extension allow you to save web content directly to Google Drive through a browser action or context menu. You can save documents, images, and HTML5 audio and video all by right clicking and selecting 'Save to Google Drive'. You can save the currently viewed URL using a browser action. The format of saved HTML pages can be controlled by the options page (Visible image, raw HTML, MHTML, or Google Doc).

New in version 1.5.7:
* Save entire web page as .png (configurable on the options page)

New in version 1.5.6:
* Support for the "Save" web intent.
  See http://webintents.org/save for more information.

New in version 1.5.5:
* Support for file:// URLs.

New in version 1.5.2:
* By default, HTML pages are saved as .png images. Using the options page, this can be changed to an .html, .mhtml, or Google document format.
* You can sign out on the options page.
* Feedback / bugs can be submitted from the options page (for @google.com addresses)
